---
title: 分割线
description: 分隔内容区域并分离模块。
---

import { Divider } from "@resolid/react-ui";
import { mergeFrontmatter } from "../__utils";
import { SpriteIcon } from "~/components/base/SpriteIcon";
import { ComponentExample, ComponentProps, ComponentUsage } from "../__components";

export const meta = mergeFrontmatter(frontmatter);

# {frontmatter.title}

{frontmatter.description}

## 导入

```js
import { Divider } from "@resolid/react-ui";
```

## 用法

<ComponentUsage
  preview={(props) => <Divider {...props} />}
  componentFile={"./divider/divider.tsx"}
  ignoreProps={["position"]}
/>

## 外观

分割线有三种不同的外观可供使用。通过传递 `variant` 属性，可以选择使用 `solid`、`dotted` 或 `dashed` 中的任意一种。

<section className={'example group'}>
  <ComponentExample className={'flex flex-col gap-5 py-5'}>
    <Divider variant={"solid"} />
    <Divider variant={"dotted"} />
    <Divider variant={"dashed"} />
  </ComponentExample>

  ```jsx
  <Divider variant={"solid"} />
  <Divider variant={"dotted"} />
  <Divider variant={"dashed"} />
  ```
</section>

## 颜色

通过传递 `color` 属性来更改分隔线的颜色。分隔线支持 `primary`、`success`、`warning`、`danger` 和 `neutral` 这些颜色。

<section className={'example group'}>
  <ComponentExample className={'flex flex-col gap-5 py-5'}>
    <Divider color={"primary"} />
    <Divider color={"success"} />
    <Divider color={"warning"} />
    <Divider color={"danger"} />
    <Divider color={"neutral"} />
  </ComponentExample>

  ```jsx
  <Divider color={"primary"} />
  <Divider color={"success"} />
  <Divider color={"warning"} />
  <Divider color={"danger"} />
  <Divider color={"neutral"} />
  ```
</section>

## 大小

分隔线使用 `${size}px` 来设置大小，大小应为数字。

<section className={'example group'}>
  <ComponentExample className={'flex flex-col gap-5 py-5'}>
    <Divider size={2} />
    <Divider size={3} />
    <Divider size={5} />
  </ComponentExample>

  ```jsx
  <Divider size={2} />
  <Divider size={3} />
  <Divider size={5} />
  ```
</section>

## 垂直分割线

<section className={'example group'}>
  <ComponentExample className={'flex flex-row px-5 gap-5'}>
    <span>文字</span>
    <Divider vertical/>
    <span>文字</span>
    <Divider vertical variant="dashed"/>
    <span>文字</span>
    <Divider vertical variant="dotted"/>
    <span>文字</span>
    <Divider vertical color={'primary'}/>
    <span>文字</span>
    <Divider vertical size={3} color={'success'} variant="dotted"/>
    <span>文字</span>
    <Divider vertical size={2} color={'danger'} variant="dashed"/>
    <span>文字</span>
  </ComponentExample>

  ```jsx
  <span>文字</span>
  <Divider vertical/>
  <span>文字</span>
  <Divider vertical variant="dashed"/>
  <span>文字</span>
  <Divider vertical variant="dotted"/>
  <span>文字</span>
  <Divider vertical color={'primary'}/>
  <span>文字</span>
  <Divider vertical size={3} color={'success'} variant="dotted"/>
  <span>文字</span>
  <Divider vertical size={2} color={'danger'} variant="dashed"/>
  <span>文字</span>
  ```
</section>

## 文本标签

<section className={'example group'}>
  <ComponentExample className={'flex flex-col gap-5 py-5'}>
    <Divider>分割线</Divider>
    <Divider position={'left'} variant="dashed">
      分割线
    </Divider>
    <Divider variant="dotted">分割线</Divider>
    <Divider color={'primary'}><SpriteIcon size={"0.813rem"} className={'mr-1'} name={"search"} /> 分割线</Divider>
    <Divider position={'right'} size={3} color={'success'} variant="dotted">
      分割线
    </Divider>
    <Divider size={2} color={'danger'} variant="dashed">
      <a href={'#text-label'} className={'text-link hover:text-link-hovered hover:underline'}>
        链接分割线
      </a>
    </Divider>
  </ComponentExample>

  ```jsx
  <Divider>分割线</Divider>
  <Divider position={'left'} variant="dashed">
    分割线
  </Divider>
  <Divider variant="dotted">分割线</Divider>
  <Divider color={'primary'}><SpriteIcon size={"0.813rem"} className={'mr-1'} name={"search"} /> 分割线</Divider>
  <Divider position={'right'} size={3} color={'success'} variant="dotted">
    分割线
  </Divider>
  <Divider size={2} color={'danger'} variant="dashed">
    <a href={'#text-label'} className={'text-link hover:text-link-hovered hover:underline'}>
      链接分割线
    </a>
  </Divider>
  ```
</section>

## 属性

<ComponentProps componentFile={"./divider/divider.tsx"} />
